abilities.name: Angelic Visage
abilities.rule: Each time a melee attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Heirs of Azkaellon
abilities.rule: While a **CHARACTER** model is leading this unit, each time a melee attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Sanguinary Banner
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Sanguinary Banner
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: ■ One model can be equipped with 1 Sanguinary banner.
■ Any number of models can each have their encarmine blade replaced with 1 encarmine spear.
■ For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model’s Angelus boltgun can be replaced with 1 inferno pistol.
unit_composition:
